title: "Facebook AI’s ‘other-play’ algorithm could improve autonomous vehicle performance"
excerpt: "A team of Facebook AI Research researchers recently developed an algorithm — other-play (OP) — that constructs strategies that achieve high returns with agents that weren’t trained with other agents (a form of zero-shot coordination). If the claims pan out, the work could greatly improve the performance of autonomous cars, which leverage ..."
